meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Erin Zwiener Jim Walke Penny Citrola Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6439.

td.p: Erin Zwiener, a conservation journalist and pet-sitter from Abiquiu, New Mexico
Jim Walke, a project manager from Greenville, South Carolina
Penny Citrola, an English language tutor originally from East Meadow, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $26,800)

tr.td: BIBLICAL SPEAKERS BUREAU
BASEBALL STADIUMS
SEPTEMBER HOLIDAYS & OBSERVANCES
DUAL BIOGRAPHIES
THAT'S IN CREDIBLE!
(Alex: As a matter of fact, each correct response will be a word that can be made of the letters in the word "credible".)

the "F" Series

JimErin!
Triple Stumper
')

tr.td: Penny
Jim
Erin!
ICE, ICE BABY
THE CRITICS SAY
WHAT THE "H"?
LET'S GET TOGETHER
HOW DOES SUNDAY MORNING SOUND?
